bibdata.title: COMMUNITY RESILIENCE PLANNING GUIDE FOR BUILDINGS AND INFRASTRUCTURE SYSTEMS: A Playbook
COMMUNITY RESILIENCE PLANNING GUIDE FOR BUILDINGS AND INFRASTRUCTURE SYSTEMS: A Playbook

organization.name: National Institute of Standards and Technology

bibdata.abstract: This handbook is intended to provide a practical, action-oriented aid to help communities follow the Guide's six-step process. It can assist communities seeking insights into resilience planning issues and help identify the most effective resilience-improvement projects.
